body:
the water from my lunch can of solid white albacore, which i drain into miso's bowl (which makes her happy), and also some frozen pretzels that are an insult to real pretzels but are still kind of satisfying, (and also the memory of the 1.5 lb pretzel they were selling at the movie theater, which was horrifying/entrancing)

the second chorus of "the winner takes it all" by abba ([https://youtu.be/iyIOl-s7JTU](https://youtu.be/iyIOl-s7JTU)), which starts with a different couplet than the first chorus, so it builds a tension of is the part about the winner taking it all going to come back for just long enough, and then it comes back, and you feel happy

conan o'brien's podcast episode with david sedaris (

[https://www.earwolf.com/episode/david-sedaris/](https://www.earwolf.com/episode/david-sedaris/)), especially the part where two of them discuss propofol reveries, but also the parts where conan is adorably a huge fan of sedaris's writing, and really the whole episode, and all of the episodes (one of the few podcasts that d and i both love in equal amounts), including the ad breaks, especially the ones for campaign monitor, a product he does not understand

how much d enjoys astrology, even though i often have no idea what she is talking about and only know about my sign (which definitely is a reflection of what sign i am)(scorpio)

the fairy lights that d bought to replace the ones covered in paper stars that had been hanging over our bed but not producing light for a few months, and the soft glow that they make

the water from my lunch can of solid white albacore, which i drain into miso's bowl (which makes her happy), and also some frozen pretzels that are an insult to real pretzels but are still kind of satisfying, (and also the memory of the 1.5 lb pretzel they were selling at the movie theater, which was horrifying/entrancing)

the second chorus of "the winner takes it all" by abba ([https://youtu.be/iyIOl-s7JTU](https://youtu.be/iyIOl-s7JTU)), which starts with a different couplet than the first chorus, so it builds a tension of is the part about the winner taking it all going to come back for just long enough, and then it comes back, and you feel happy

conan o'brien's podcast episode with david sedaris (

[https://www.earwolf.com/episode/david-sedaris/](https://www.earwolf.com/episode/david-sedaris/)), especially the part where two of them discuss propofol reveries, but also the parts where conan is adorably a huge fan of sedaris's writing, and really the whole episode, and all of the episodes (one of the few podcasts that d and i both love in equal amounts), including the ad breaks, especially the ones for campaign monitor, a product he does not understand

how much d enjoys astrology, even though i often have no idea what she is talking about and only know about my sign (which definitely is a reflection of what sign i am)(scorpio)

the fairy lights that d bought to replace the ones covered in paper stars that had been hanging over our bed but not producing light for a few months, and the soft glow that they make
